casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William ARTIS. No. 617P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Stanley G. Adams, Wilson, for Artis. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of December 2004 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
